name: Truck Cargo Driving 3D
description:
Become a professional carrier truck driver! Navigate this bulky yet beautiful machine along urban roads by delivering goods to destinations. This free to play game will expose you to various situations testing your driving and steering abilities. The cargo is waiting, and so are your clients. Don’t be late; be prudent!

Truck Cargo Driving 3D Features:
•Real truck driving experience
•Different camera angles
•Excellent graphics
